text: @MattHancock You protected the NHS and continue to do so, to manage the number of people infected with Covid-19 as your planned strategy of 'herd immunity' unrolls, ensuring thousands of economically unviable citizens die. You are part of a cynical cabal. History will condemn you.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
